Need help reading this?

constructor

constructor - Give the object an NIS URL to interact with.

constructor(endpoint: string)
Parameters
endpoint (string) HTTP formatted base URL of the NIS, including port.

asuri

asuri - Given JSON, convert to URL syntax.

asuri(data: string): string
Parameters
data (string) JSON formatted data
Returns
string: URI formatted arguments

get

get - Sends an HTTP GET request to the API.

get(path: string, data: json, callback: function)
Parameters
path (string) Relative path of API call.
data (json) JSON formatted object to send.
callback (function) Callback that is given a response object.

post

post - Sends an HTTP Post request to the API.

post(path: string, data: json, callback: function)
Parameters
path (string) Relative path of API call.
data (json) JSON formatted object to send.
callback (function) Callback that is given a response object.

fixpkey

fixpkey - Fix a hex key for use in signing.

fixpkey(privatekey: string): string
Parameters
privatekey (string) Private key in hex format.
Returns
string: Fixed private key.

sign

sign - Sign a given object with a given private key.

sign(privatekey: string, content: object): string
Parameters
privatekey (string) Private key of NEM account in hex.
content (object) Thing that you want to sign.
Returns
string: Signature of object as a string.

makeTX

makeTX - Make a transaction given a transaction object and a private key.

makeTX(options: txobject, privatekey: String): parsedtxobject
Parameters
options (txobject) Transaction object.
privatekey (String) A private NEM key.
Returns
parsedtxobject: An object ready to be signTX'd.

signTX

signTX - Sign a parsedtxobject into a ready to send transaction announce.

signTX(transaction: parsedtxobject, privatekey: String): announceobject
Parameters
transaction (parsedtxobject) A transaction parsed with makeTX.
privatekey (String) A private NEM key.
Returns
announceobject: An object ready to /announce.

doTX

doTX - Fully completes a transaction with makeTX and signTX, then sends.

doTX(options: txobject, privatekey: String, callback: callback)
Parameters
options (txobject) Unparsed transaction object.
privatekey (String) A private NEM key.
callback (callback) Same callback as post();

setEndpoint

setEndpoint - Set the endpoint of the NIS instance.

setEndpoint(privatekey: String, endpoint: any)
Parameters
privatekey (String) A private NEM key.
endpoint (any)

connectWS

connectWS - Connects to the websocket provider of the current endpoint.

connectWS(success: callback, fail: callback)
Parameters
success (callback) Success callback.
fail (callback) Failure callback.

subscribeWS

connectWS - Connects to the websocket provider of the current endpoint.

subscribeWS(subscription: callback, callback: callback)
Parameters
subscription (callback) URL Path you want to sub to. Example: /blocks/new
callback (callback) Callback to run when something is recieved.

_serializeSafeString

NOTE, related to serialization: Unfortunately we need to create few objects and do a bit of copying, as Uint32Array does not allow random offsets

_serializeSafeString(str: any)
Parameters
str (any)
